name: Bright Side Bookshop
description: Bright Side Bookshop is a beloved independent bookstore in downtown Flagstaff with a wonderful children's section. The store hosts regular story times and author events for kids. The knowledgeable staff can help find the perfect book for any young reader.
shortDescription: Independent bookstore with excellent children's section and regular story times.
address: 18 N San Francisco St, Flagstaff, AZ 86001
hours: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM Mon-Sat, 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM Sun
topPickReason: The best children's bookstore in Flagstaff with friendly staff and regular kids' events.
tips: Check their calendar for story time events

name: Bookmans Entertainment Exchange
description: Bookmans is a treasure trove of used books, games, toys, and media. Kids can spend hours browsing the extensive children's book section, toy aisle, and game section. Trade in your gently used items for store credit - a great way to teach kids about recycling and reusing!
shortDescription: Used bookstore and entertainment exchange with books, games, toys, and more.
address: 1520 S Riordan Ranch St, Flagstaff, AZ 86001
tips: Bring items to trade for store credit
Check the game section for deals
Kids' section is in the back corner

name: Babies 2 Kids Resale
description: Babies 2 Kids is a consignment shop specializing in gently used children's clothing, toys, and baby gear. It's the perfect place to find quality items at great prices, and you can consign your kids' outgrown items too. Local families love this sustainable shopping option.
shortDescription: Children's consignment shop with quality clothing, toys, and baby gear at great prices.
address: 2717 S Woodlands Village Blvd, Flagstaff, AZ 86001
